description.fr: Lorsqu’une {Summoning:898} meurt\_:\v Confère {#RESURRECTABLE} aléatoirement à l’un de vos compagnons morts.
description.en: When a {Summoning:898} dies:\v Confers {#RESURRECTABLE} on one of your dead companions at random.
description.es: Cuando una {Summoning:898} muere:\v Confiere {#RESURRECTABLE} aleatoriamente a uno de tus compañeros muertos.
description.de: Wenn eine\_{Summoning:898} stirbt:\v Verleiht einem deiner toten Begleiter zufällig {#RESURRECTABLE}.
description.pt: Quando uma {Summoning:898} morre:\v Concede {#RESURRECTABLE} aleatoriamente a um dos seus companheiros mortos.
